name: White Ball
description:
White ball is fast arcade game. 

You can gain records and medals and share it to your friends with sharing button. 

You can also play offline, but you lose second chance to continue playing. 

This is a lot of fun and you will be play again and again and again :) 

This is very simply game. Both kids and adults can play. Even teenagers ;) 

Control of white ball is very simple. You can use all screen to turn left (left side of screen) or turn right (right side of screen). 

This is one player game. 

Music in this game is created by Nicole Marie T and belive me this music is awesome.

You can play in train, car (but not as driver ;)), bus, subway, boat, tram. Wherever you want.

As in a lot of game you must beware enemy. In this game enemy are spikes. 

In right top corner you can see your best score so you know which score is to beat ;)

In this game you can't find some secret key or exit. You don't need this. You only need to collect coin / yellow balls / score points. You know what's going on. 

Another option in game are medals. In this moment are seven medals to gain. First medal is easy to win, but try win all of it :D

Game have simple graphic. Font in game is modern and clear. 

Good luck :)
